chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
c: Equality.sort nat_eqType
d: dstatelet
C: LockCoh d
pf: is_true (c \in nodes)
m: client_state

Goal:
c \in clients -> getLocal c d = st :-> m -> getSt_client C pf = m

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
nodes = [:: server] ++ clients : seq nid
Inductive client_state : Set := NotHeld : client_state | Held : nat -> client_state Arguments Held _%nat_scope
nid = nat : Set
st = ptr_nat 1 : ptr
LockCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
getSt_client : forall (c : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), LockCoh d -> c \in nodes -> client_state
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients c : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d pf : c \in nodes m : client_state |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients c : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d pf : c \in nodes m : client_state |- ?A -> Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients c : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d pf : c \in nodes m : client_state |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients c : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d pf : c \in nodes m : client_state |- Type]
getSt_server_K : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : LockCoh d) (m : server_state), getLocal server d = st : -> m -> getSt_server C = m
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
getLocal_coh : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), LockCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == server then exists ss : server_state, getLocal n d = st :-> ss else n \in clients /\ (exists cs : client_state, getLocal n d = st :-> cs))
getLocal_client_st_tp : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), LockCoh d -> n \in clients -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = client_state
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
elimTF : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), reflect P b -> b = c -> if c then P else ~ P
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Ordered.clone : forall (T : Type) (cT : ordType) (c : Ordered.class_of T), phant_id (Ordered.class cT) c -> ordType
getLocal_server_st_tp : forall d : dstatelet, LockCoh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal server d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = server_state
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
client_not_server : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> (n == server) = false
client_state_rec : forall P : client_state -> Set, P NotHeld -> (forall n : nat, P (Held n)) -> forall c : client_state, P c
client_state_rect : forall P : client_state -> Type, P NotHeld -> (forall n : nat, P (Held n)) -> forall c : client_state, P c
client_state_sind : forall P : client_state -> SProp, P NotHeld -> (forall n : nat, P (Held n)) -> forall c : client_state, P c
client_state_ind : forall P : client_state -> Prop, P NotHeld -> (forall n : nat, P (Held n)) -> forall c : client_state, P c
client_nodes : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> n \in nodes
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
coh_dom_upd : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> LockCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
coh_msg = fun (pkt : msg TaggedMessage) (e : nat_eqType) => if from pkt == server then to pkt \in clients /\ msg_from_server (content pkt) e else if from pkt \in clients then to pkt == server /\ msg_from_client (content pkt) else False : msg TaggedMessage -> nat_eqType -> Prop
local_coh = fun n : nid => [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == server then exists ss : server_state, server_local_coh ss h else n \in clients /\ (exists cs : client_state, client_local_coh cs h))] : nid -> Simpl_Pred (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
server_local_coh = fun ss : server_state => [Pred h | h = st : -> ss] : server_state -> Simpl_Pred heapUMC
client_local_coh = fun cs : client_state => [Pred h | h = st : -> cs] : client_state -> Simpl_Pred heapUMC
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
state_coh = fun d : dstatelet => forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> local_coh n (getLocal n d) : dstatelet -> Prop
eqc : forall (C : Type) (interp : C -> Type) (A : C) (pf : A = A) (v : interp A), cast interp pf v = v
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
server_send_step = fun (ss : server_state) (to : nid) => if to \in clients then match outstanding ss with | [::] => ss | _ :: out' => {| outstanding := out'; current_epoch := (current_epoch ss).+1; current_holder := Some to |} end else ss : server_state -> nid -> server_state
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
getSt_server : forall d : dstatelet, LockCoh d -> server_state
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
rot_to_arc : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x y : T), uniq p -> x \in p -> y \in p -> x != y -> rot_to_arc_spec p x y
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P

```intros. intros Hin HgetLocal.
unfold getLocal in HgetLocal. simpl in HgetLocal.
rewrite HgetLocal. auto.```

original: intros. intros Hin HgetLocal. unfold getLocal in HgetLocal. simpl in HgetLocal. rewrite HgetLocal. auto.
